dc_title_s: Chesapeake Bay Earth Science Atlas no. 1, 2 : Head of Chesapeake Bay, Approaches to Baltimore Harbor
dc_description_s: STATE OF MARYLAND -- DEPARTMENT OF NATURAL RESOURCES -- MARYLAND GEOLOGICAL SURVEY -- KENNETH N. WEAVER, Director -- CHESAPEAKE BAY EARTH SCIENCE ATLASES NOS. 1, 2 -- 1. HEAD OF CHESAPEAKE BAY -- 2. APPROACHES T0 BALTIMORE HARBOR -- by ROBERT H. CUTHBERTSON, Editor 1987 -- CONTENTS -- ATLAS NO. 1 -- MAP 1-1 SAMPLING LOCATIONS Robert H. Cuthbertson and Jeffery P. Halka -- MAP 1-2 SULFUR CONTENT Lamere Hennessee -- MAP 1-3 SEDIMENT DISTRIBUTION Randall T. Kerhin, Jeffery P. Halka, Lamere Hennessee, Darlene V. Wells and Patricia J. Blakeslee -- MAP 1-6 PATTERNS OF EROSION AND DEPOSITION Nicholas Zoltan and Randall T. Kerhin -- ATLAS NO. 2 -- MAP 2-1 SAMPLING LOCATIONS Robert H. Cuthbertson and Jeffery P.
